name: logo and clock
format:
<style>
    .md-toolbar-tools{
        background-image: url("/logo/logo_hybuild-white.png");
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
        background-position: center;
        background-size: contain;
    }
</style>

<script id="titleScript" type="text/javascript">

$(function() {
    if($('.md-toolbar-tools').length != 0){
        loadClock();
    }else setTimeout(loadClock, 500)
});

function loadClock(){
    if(!$('#clock').length) {
        var toolbar = $('.md-toolbar-tools');
        
        var div = $('<div/>');
        var p = $('<p/ id="clock">');
        
        div.append(p);
        div[0].style.margin = '5px 5px 5px auto';
        toolbar.append(div);
    
        function displayTitle(lh) {
            p.text(lh); 
        }
        
        function upTime() {
            var d = new Date();
            p.text(d.toLocaleString().replace(", "," - "));
        }
    
        if(document.clockInterval){ 
                clearInterval(document.clockInterval);
                document.clockInterval = null;
        }
            
        document.clockInterval = setInterval(upTime,1000);
    }
}

</script>

name: Make table data
CRON Info
format:
CRON Format...

    s  m  h  md m  wd y
    |  |  |  |  |  |  |
    *  *  *  *  *  *  *    Field              Allowed values    Special symbols
    |  |  |  |  |  |  |    -----------------  ---------------   ---------------
    `--|--|--|--|--|--|->  Second (optional)  0-59              * / , -
       `--|--|--|--|--|->  Minute             0-59              * / , -
          `--|--|--|--|->  Hour               0-23              * / , -
             `--|--|--|->  Day of Month       1-31              * / , - L W
                `--|--|->  Month              1-12 or JAN-DEC   * / , -
                   `--|->  Day of Week        0-7 or SUN-SAT    * / , - L #
                      `->  Year (optional)    1970-2099         * / , -
Example CRON Expressions
Expression Description
* * * * * * Every Second
0 * * * * * Every minute
0 */10 * * * * Every 10 minutes
0 */20 1 * * * Every 20 minutes, between 01:00 AM and 01:59 AM
0 15,30,45 * * * * At 15, 30, and 45 minutes past the hour
0 0 12 * * * Every day at noon - 12pm
0 0 2 29 FEB * 2020-2040 At 02:00 AM, on day 29 of the month, only in February, every 4 years, 2020 through 2040
0 0 7 * * MON#1 * At 07:00 AM, on the first Monday of the month
0 0 12 * JAN,FEB,MAR,APR * Every day at noon in January, February, March and April
* * 1W * * Every minute, on the first weekday of the month
* * * * Tue#3 Every minute, on the third Tuesday of the month
0 12 * * MONL At 12:00 PM, on the last Monday of the month
